messages.content: Create implementation plan for: â€œBuild me a remote team management app with dashboards, employee profiles, project tracking, and a simple admin panel.â€

<plan>
  <overview>A comprehensive remote team management application with employee profiles, project tracking, time management, and admin controls. Features include team dashboards, individual employee profiles with skills and availability, project management with task assignment, time tracking, and an admin panel for user management and system configuration.</overview>
  
  <steps>
    <step id="1" name="Backend Database Models" priority="high" dependencies="">
      <description>Create core database models for users, projects, tasks, and time tracking</description>
      <files>
        <file path="backend/models/user.py">User model with roles and profile data</file>
        <file path="backend/models/project.py">Project model with status and team assignments</file>
        <file path="backend/models/task.py">Task model with assignments and progress tracking</file>
        <file path="backend/models/time_entry.py">Time tracking model for work hours</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="2" name="Authentication & Authorization" priority="high" dependencies="1">
      <description>Implement JWT-based authentication with role-based access control</description>
      <files>
        <file path="backend/services/auth_service.py">Authentication endpoints and JWT handling</file>
        <file path="backend/middleware/auth.py">Authentication middleware and role checking</file>
        <file path="backend/models/auth.py">Authentication request/response models</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="3" name="User Management API" priority="high" dependencies="2">
      <description>CRUD endpoints for user management and profile handling</description>
      <files>
        <file path="backend/services/user_service.py">User CRUD operations and profile endpoints</file>
        <file path="backend/models/user_schemas.py">User request/response schemas</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="4" name="Project & Task API" priority="high" dependencies="3">
      <description>Project and task management endpoints with team assignments</description>
      <files>
        <file path="backend/services/project_service.py">Project CRUD and team management</file>
        <file path="backend/services/task_service.py">Task management and assignment endpoints</file>
        <file path="backend/models/project_schemas.py">Project and task request/response schemas</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="5" name="Time Tracking API" priority="medium" dependencies="4">
      <description>Time tracking endpoints for work hours and productivity metrics</description>
      <files>
        <file path="backend/services/time_service.py">Time entry CRUD and reporting</file>
        <file path="backend/models/time_schemas.py">Time tracking request/response schemas</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="6" name="Frontend Authentication" priority="high" dependencies="2">
      <description>Frontend authentication setup with login/logout and protected routes</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/services/auth.ts">Authentication API service</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx">Authentication context provider</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx">Login page component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.tsx">Protected route wrapper</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="7" name="Dashboard Layout & Navigation" priority="high" dependencies="6">
      <description>Main application layout with sidebar navigation and dashboard</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx">Main dashboard with team overview</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/TeamStats.tsx">Team statistics component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/RecentActivity.tsx">Recent activity feed</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/app-sidebar.tsx">Updated sidebar with navigation</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="8" name="Employee Profiles" priority="medium" dependencies="7">
      <description>Employee profile pages with skills, availability, and project history</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/EmployeeListPage.tsx">Employee directory page</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/EmployeeProfilePage.tsx">Individual employee profile</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/EmployeeCard.tsx">Employee card component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/services/user.ts">User API service</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="9" name="Project Management" priority="medium" dependencies="8">
      <description>Project listing, details, and task management interface</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx">Projects listing page</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/ProjectDetailPage.tsx">Project details and tasks</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx">Project card component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/services/project.ts">Project API service</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="10" name="Task Management" priority="medium" dependencies="9">
      <description>Task creation, assignment, and progress tracking</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/TaskBoard.tsx">Kanban-style task board</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx">Individual task component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/services/task.ts">Task API service</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="11" name="Time Tracking Interface" priority="low" dependencies="10">
      <description>Time tracking UI for logging work hours and generating reports</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/TimeTrackingPage.tsx">Time tracking dashboard</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/TimeTracker.tsx">Active time tracking component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/services/time.ts">Time tracking API service</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="12" name="Admin Panel" priority="low" dependencies="11">
      <description>Admin interface for user management and system configuration</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx">Admin dashboard</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/UserManagement.tsx">User management component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/SystemSettings.tsx">System settings component</file>
      </files>
    </step>
  </steps>
  
  <file_tree>
frontend/

ğŸ¯ FOCUSED STEP IMPLEMENTATION - STEP 1 ONLY

**CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:**
- ONLY work on Step 1: Backend Database Models
- ONLY create the files specified in this step
- DO NOT create additional files beyond what's listed
- DO NOT work on other steps or tasks
- FOCUS EXCLUSIVELY on this specific step

**STEP DETAILS:**
Create core database models for users, projects, tasks, and time tracking

**FILES TO CREATE (ONLY THESE):**
<file path="backend/models/user.py">User model with roles and profile data</file>
        <file path="backend/models/project.py">Project model with status and team assignments</file>
        <file path="backend/models/task.py">Task model with assignments and progress tracking</file>
        <file path="backend/models/time_entry.py">Time tracking model for work hours</file>

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Create ONLY the files listed above
- Implement complete, working code for each file
- Ensure files work together within this step
- Follow existing project patterns and conventions
- DO NOT add extra features or files not specified in this step

EXCEPTION:
- You are allowed to good amount of `backend` testing to ensure accuracy

Focus strictly on this step and these files only.
